titles.title: Digital Performance Right in Sound Recordings Act of 1993
To amend title 17, United States Code, to provide an exclusive right to perform sound recordings publicly by means of digital transmissions.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1710-1711, E1724-1725)
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Intellectual Property and Judicial Administration.

bill.summary: 7/1/1993--Introduced. Digital Performance Right in Sound Recordings Act of 1993 - Provides an exclusive right to perform sound recordings publicly by means of digital transmissions.
